results.name: Just A Walk In The Park

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers. Most modern headsets supported.
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers. Most modern headsets supported.
